name: nativescript-3dtouch
description: Use 3D Touch to create quick actions for your home screen icon.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios --device "iPhone 6s"
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-3dtouch && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
